attributes.action: Make e-scooters legal to use same as e-bikes if it doesn't go over 15.5mph!
attributes.additional_details: It's much cheaper and cleaner transport than a car. It also gives more flexibility for people who has no access to car or moped or can not afford to keep one.
attributes.background: E-scooter is one of the best transportation in towns and cities. There are many responsible riders risking prosecution because of using this kind of transportation. Please make e-scooter -which can not go over 15.5mph- in the same category as e-bike.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642263
Legalise private e-scooters on public roads and bike lanes
